summary: Con man Kevin Lennihan, framed in a jewel smuggling, tries for an insanity plea, and is sent to a hospital for review, where he is confused for a doctor and takes over the hospital when a major storm hits.
cast: Richard Pryor|Rachel Ticotin|Rubén Blades|Joe Mantegna|Bob Dishy|Sylvia Miles|Joe Dallesandro|Randall 'Tex' Cobb|Bob Saget|Joseph Ragno|Jon Polito|Garrett Morris|Brian Tarantina|Jude Ciccolella|Çigdem Selisik Onat|Lucius Houghton|Joe Aufiery|Kate McGregor-Stewart|Randell Haynes|Al White|Marquerita Wallace|Manera Smith|Verna Hampton|Lou Walker|Doris Dworsky|Denis Hamill|John Hamill|Ralf D. Bode|Ann Pollack|Miriam Cruz|Teresa Yenque|Wesley Snipes|Mike Silver|Kevin Campbell|Mel Shrawder|Larry Graves|Jack Hallett|Michael Medeiros|Keith Roberts|Karen Jones-Meadows|Feiga Martinez|Elizabeth Arlen|Peg Banesse|Joe Rivers|Clifford Jackson|Lara Marshall|Leroy Staples|Johnny Howie|Steve Boles|John Woodson|Bennie Moore|Jeffrey Pillars|Joseph Coscia|Del Roy|Laura Bastianelli|Lee Lawrence|Geoff Gordon|Ron Amari|Raymond Rosario|Maria Cardinale|Maureen Kedes
title: Estado crítico
